SELECT SUBSTRING(PI_BUSINESS_DATA1,1, CHARINDEX(PI_BUSINESS_DATA1,';')) FORM_ID, PI_SUBJECT, PI_NAME, isnull(PI_DSCR, '') PI_DSCR, PI_INITIATOR_NAME, PI_INITIATOR_ID, PI_ID, PI_STATE, PI_PPI_ID, PI_PI_ID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),PI_STARTED,120) AS PI_STARTED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),PI_FINISHED,120) AS PI_FINISHED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),PI_DELETED,120) AS PI_DELETED, PF_ID, PF_SUB_KIND, PF_PERFORMER_ID, PF_PERFORMER_NAME, WI_PERFORMER_ID, WI_PERFORMER_NAME, WI_DEPUTY_ID, WI_DEPUTY_NAME, WI_STATE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),WI_CREATED,120) AS WI_CREATED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),WI_FINISHED,120) AS WI_FINISHED, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16),WI_DELETED,120) AS WI_DELETED, WI_ID, WI_NAME, isnull(PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_ID, '') PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_ID, isnull(PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_NAME, '') PI_INITIATOR_UNIT_NAME, isnull(PI_BUSINESS_DATA1, '') PI_BUSINESS_DATA1, isnull(PI_BUSINESS_DATA2, '') PI_BUSINESS_DATA2, CASE @MODE WHEN 'APPROVAL' THEN 'APPROVAL' WHEN 'PROCESS' THEN 'PROCESS' ELSE 'COMPLETE' END AS MODE, CONVERT(VARCHAR(16), CASE @MODE WHEN 'APPROVAL' THEN WI_CREATED WHEN 'PROCESS' THEN WI_FINISHED ELSE PI_FINISHED END, 120) AS WORKDT
FROM WF_WORKITEM_LIST (NOLOCK) WHERE PF_PERFORMER_ID = @PF_PERFORMER_ID AND WI_STATE = @WI_STATE AND PI_STATE = @PI_STATE AND PF_SUB_KIND = @PF_SUB_KIND ORDER BY WI_CREATED DESC FOR XML AUTO
